ygData.subject: Re: Gladiator BF
ygData.msgSnippet: The reason Gladiator: Beyond Freedom shuts down when you hit go is that there s no default first level. Look in the directory to see which levels ARE there,

The reason Gladiator: Beyond Freedom shuts down when
you hit "go" is that there's no default first level.
Look in the directory to see which levels ARE there,
then manually input those levels. That should work for
ya.
   -T.
